CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, July 2, 1955, pg. 27 reads: "2. Lenny Gordon and Warren Sinnhuber of M. Lifsher and Son, demonstrate one of their storm windows from the massive stage set up by William J. Appelt of the Ludwig Hommel Company, distributors of Norge Appliances. In the background are Earl Davis, local Courier advertising manager; Mrs. Prothro, Herb Wright, Mrs. Robert L. Vann, president of The Courier, and Miss Betty Stokes."
TitMainTitle: Lenny Gordon and Warren Sinnhuber of M. Lifsher and Son, demonstrating storm window in Norge Appliances display, with from left: Earl Davis, Louise Prothro, Herb Wright, Jessie Vann, and Betty Stokes, in background, in Syria Mosque for the 1955 Pittsburgh Courier Home Service Fair
